title: People and power
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Barrie Howells, John Kemeny, Peter Pearson and Bonnie Sherr Klein
brief_description: This film examines Saul Alinsky’s method of organising communities into effective action units based on participatory democracy. Conflict and controversy are an integral part of Alinsky’s approach. Alinsky talks about his philosophy and the dynamics of organisation.
